page.title: 16VIEWS ON THE POWER STATION
page.content: We went out of school and asked 50 people some questions on their views on the{nuclear power station}at Druridge Bay.The response was good,but with different views.These are the questions we asked: {Q.1:}Do you think there should be a {nuclear power station}built in this area? {Answers:}NO 39; YES 8 DON'T KNOW 3. {Q. 2:}Do you think a{nuclear power {station}would provide more jobs ? {Answers:}NO 12 YES 27 DON'T KNOW 11. { Q.3:}Do you think it would affect people's health ? {Anwers:}NO 3 YES 34 DON'T KNOW 8. {Q.4:}Do you think it will spoil the enviroment ? {Answers:}NO 12 YES 37 DON'T KNOW 1. {Q.5:}If a{nuclear power station}was built would you still stay here? {Answers:}NO 13 YES 34 DON'T KNOW 3.
